channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1259; 05:31PM; 19528 W Leadwell St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RCbcmj; Reseda; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to one room of one unit in a triplex (updated building type), preventing the fire from extending into the attic. No further details.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E287 E290 E293 E73 RA100 RA73 T73 T87 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1259; 05:13PM; 19528 W Leadwell St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RCbcmj; Reseda; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E287 E290 E293 E73 RA100 RA73 T73 T87 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1417; 07:49PM; 12650 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aD7h16; Pacoima; A four car collision with five patients: 4 have minor, non-life threatening injuries and one was quickly extricated from the vehicle in critical condition (age/gender unknown). LAPD Inc# 3676 No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E275 E7 E98 EM14 HR3 RA75 RA898 RA91 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0541; 10:29AM; 11200 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48sVRLF; Palms; Incident updated to a single car collision and patient safely extricated. Firefighter/paramedics are assessing and will provide transport as required. LAPD Inc# 1491. No further details. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 E263 E43 E62 E69 EM11 HR3 RA59 RA62 T63 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0541; 10:11AM; 11200 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48sVRLF; Palms; Two car collision with one car overturned and one patient trapped. Firefighters are conducting an auto extrication operation. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC4 E263 E43 E62 E69 EM11 HR3 RA59 RA62 T63 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0925; 02:34PM; Hollywood Hills West; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tswn2f; Hollywood Hills; LAFD Air Ops located the injured hiker mid-slope on the hillside and lowered a rescuer for assessment. The adult, female patient suffered a ground level fall and sustained a possible ankle fracture. LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation followed by hospital transport. No further details.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 12/25/2023 INC#0078

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#0078; 12:55AM; 5021 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWj0AQ; South Park; Firefighters extinguished fire in a detached bungalow in 14 minutes. Sadly two family pets were located inside, deceased. Five occupants are displaced and being assisted with immediate needs. No further details. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 12/25/2023 INC#0023

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#0023; 12:20AM; 17841 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tohSMW; Northridge; 30 firefighters extinguished fire in one unit on the 2nd floor of a 3 story (two residential over parking) garden style apartment building in 15 minutes. There are no injuries reported. No further details; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1209; 05:44PM; 2712 S Halldale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vbpK4X; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. The fire extended from the 1st to the 2nd floor with no other structures damaged. One 44 y/o male patient transported in serious condition with smoke inhalation and traumatic leg injury. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1209; 05:21PM; 1770 W 27th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vdtMcT; Adams-Normandie; Two story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing from the 1st floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
